attributes.action: encourage merseytravel to provide mobile coverage on underground train services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Merseytravel currently have mobile phone coverage installed in both the Queensway (Birkenhead) and Kingsway (Wallasey) tunnel but not on the rail system.

This needs to be changed because it would mean people could use their mobile phones not only in day-to-day life but also crucially if an emergency situation were to occur.
